channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18077] Vectorization: Add string conversion case for UDFToDouble
item.summary: Vectorization: Add string conversion case for UDFToDouble

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Similar to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-15857: Vectorization: Add string conversion case for UDFToInteger, etc
